day_sunny: The sunlight looks pretty in Dani's hair
rain: We always make love when it rains
Days like this make you wet ;)
When life throws you a rainy day, play in the puddles.
day_cloudy: It's so cloudy, the spy satellites cannot see you.
Overcast days are no bother; you are my sun.
night_ cloudy: The clouds make the night feel cozy and mysterious
night_clear: Think about getting the telescope out tonight
Clear night to see the stars
night_rain:
and the rain rain rain

fog: Take extra care driving, there is fog out there

night_snow: You may get several inches tonight...of snow

....-10-31: The veil between the living and the dead is at its thinnest tonight.
We find it delightfully unlivable here in this ghostly retreat.

Do not pull down on the safety bar, please.
 I will lower it for you.
Serpents and spiders, tail of a rat, call in the spirits, wherever they’re at!
